subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] on a lighter note
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Some of the good ones I know of are Avast, Grisoft AVG Antivirus and
Avira. Microsoft Security Essentials is actually pretty good but it's
a resource hog.

Zack

On 11/7/11, Ursula <kalinu@...> wrote:
> Can someone tell me a good antivirus for my computer???
>
